keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce 'Health Credit Voucher' to choose NHS or private treatment. Pursue charges of hospital wards, prescriptions, and dental check-ups.
Scrap taxes on the minimum wage. Increase 31K flat rate. Introduce a 15% flat rate for all. Control council tax by scrapping EU laws.
Create more than a million new manufacturing jobs, reintroduce workfare programme, control public service debt, and reduce the deficit.
End tolerance on crime. Increase the number of police, abolish IPCC, deport foreign criminals, and ban the burka in security zones.
Bring back the three Rs and simplify exams at all levels, return grammar schools, and allow corporal punishment with parental consent.

mentions.candidate: Roy Goode. A Businessman in Stafford, Roy is an entrepreneur and runs his own local family business.

issues.economy: The Labour government has brought the UK economy to its knees.
issues.immigration: End mass uncontrolled and unlimited immigration. Regain control of our own borders. End all illegal immigrants' amnesty. Deport those taking UK jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Roy Goode is UKIP's Parliamentary Candidate for Stafford.
